wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Parsonage (born 30 May 1985) is a British water polo player. At the 2012 Summer Olympics, he competed for the Great Britain men's national water polo team in the men's event. He is 5 feet 11 inches (1.80 metres) tall and weighs 192 pounds (87 kilograms).

response: * Alexander Parsonage (theatre director) (born 1980), English actor, writer and theatre director
* Alexander Parsonage (water polo) (born 1985), British water polo player
